[1;32mParameter docstrings: =====================[0m

[1;34mimage_mode: When to save images.[0m [1;31mimage_file: Filename for the saved image. File extension png sutomatically added.[0m [1;34msnapshot_interval_in_sec: Sec between snapshots[0m [1;31mvideo_file: Filename for the saved video. File extension mp4 sutomatically added.[0m [1;34mfps: Video speed[0m [1;31msave_video: Whether to save a video.[0m [1;34mmode: Screen mode.[0m [1;31mshow_display: Whether to launch the pygame-visualization.[0m [1;34mvisible_trails: Draw the larva trajectories[0m [1;31mtrail_dt: Duration of the drawn trajectories[0m [1;34mtrail_color: Whether to display larva tracks according to the instantaneous forward or angular velocity.[0m [1;31mdraw_sensors: Draw the larva sensors[0m [1;34mdraw_contour: Draw the larva contour[0m [1;31mdraw_segs: Draw the larva body segments[0m [1;34mdraw_midline: Draw the larva midline[0m [1;31mdraw_centroid: Draw the larva centroid[0m [1;34mdraw_head: Draw the larva head[0m [1;31mdraw_orientations: Draw the larva body vector orientations[0m [1;34mintro_text: Show the introductory configuration screen[0m [1;31modor_aura: Draw the aura around odor sources[0m [1;34mallow_clicks: Whether to allow input from display[0m [1;31mblack_background: Set the background color to black[0m [1;34mrandom_colors: Color each larva with a random color[0m [1;31mcolor_behavior: Color the larvae according to their instantaneous behavior[0m [1;34mpanel_width: The width of the side panel in pixels[0m [1;31mdims: The arena dimensions in pixels[0m [1;34mcentered: Whether area is centered to (0,0)[0m
